com.mapgroup.to

Interface IRemoteServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IRemoteServer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote interface for the server which grants to the client to ask for some resources.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerResponse satisfyRequest(ClientRequest clientRequest)
      Returns the appropriate response according to the specific client's request specified.

    • Method Detail

                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the appropriate response according to the specific client's request specified.

        Returns:
        the result of the computation
        Throws:
